00017 /* DON'T PUT A SEMICOLON after the word INITIALIZATION in your source file */
00018 
00019 #define INITIALIZATION(n) fptr *FNS; main(fptr *f) { RememberA0(); SetUpA4(); FNS = f; \
00020 (n)(); RestoreA4(); }
00021 
00022 #define NEWOBJECT(c) newobject(c)

00024 setup(&c,nf,ff,(short)cs,mf,t1,t2,t3,t4,t5);
00025 
00026 /* if you have fewer than 5 arguments for the setup type list, just put 0 in to fill */
